title: PBE Login Failed
body: So i go and check on m application for PBE it says i got accepted and create an account also download the client so i download the client and create an account, the client finish downloaded i try to sign in with the exact info it says its wrong can i please get help i submitted an ticket (3 of them) and never got reply its been like couple days. please help

replies.body:
We'll definitely want to take a look at your account, so I recommend waiting for a specialist to pick up your ticket so we can work together to resolve this.

Next time I recommend submitting a single ticket, since multiples can sometimes make it harder to help you. Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for msging me back i been waiting for past 2-4 days and still havnt got a email back,
i tried to create a new account but when i go to the [](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) it tells me to submit an application after i got accepted so it weird so i go to my Profile setting then to pre-releasing testing and it only says Alpha client(which i applied about 4-9 months ago) and there is no sign of PBE was it a glitch i dont know but its kinda unfair
